Title: S7:E6 - What are progressive web apps? (Frances Coronel)
Description: What are progressive web apps? And why are they so important? Frances breaks down what they are, how they work, and how they make technology more accessible. We also have our sixth episode of "Tales from the Command Line" where Scotts gives us a tour of the infrastructure needed to make mobile happen. Show Links Partner with Dev & CodeNewbie!
